name: Moving Day (itch) (slipperyfox)
description:
It's moving day but you accidently packed your phone, wallet, and keys into a box. You'll want to avoid causing too much collateral damage if you want your security deposit back. Find your stuff so you can get out of there! 

WASD to move, shift to zoom, LMB to shoot

This was made for GGJ21.

Thanks for looking!
